machine comprehension.from sentence: In this paper , aiming to make the machine comprehension fast , we propose to remove the recurrent nature of these models .

convolutions and self - attentions.from sentence: We instead exclusively use convolutions and self - attentions as the building blocks of encoders that separately encodes the query and context .

learn.from sentence: Then we learn the interactions between context and question by standard attentions .

encoded again.from sentence: The resulting representation is encoded again with our recurrency - free encoder before finally decoding to the probability of each position being the start or end of the answer span .

call.from sentence: We call this architecture QANet , which is shown in .
